definitions.definition: A major subprovincial city , the provincial capital of Jiangsu , China , on the lower Yangtze ; a former capital of China .
Synonym of Jiangnan , Nanzhili , Liangjiang , etc. as imperial Chinese provinces or viceroyalties administered from Nanjing.
Various other Chinese cities during periods when they acted as a southern capital of a kingdom or imperial dynasty .

main_definition: A major subprovincial city , the provincial capital of Jiangsu , China , on the lower Yangtze ; a former capital of China .
secondary_definitions: ( historical , informal ) Synonym of Jiangnan , Nanzhili , Liangjiang , etc. as imperial Chinese provinces or viceroyalties administered from Nanjing.
( historical ) Various other Chinese cities during periods when they acted as a southern capital of a kingdom or imperial dynasty .
